creator: lapsap7+asf@gmail.com
text:
With 2.2.4 installer for windows (apache_2.2.4-win32-x86-no_ssl.msi), blank
domain name/web server name/email entries aren't detected and the installer just
lets them go. 

This will lead to unsuccessful installation of Apache.

With 2.0.59 installer, we don't have this problem.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 41220 ***
creator: wrowe@apache.org
